positions.title: Cashier
positions.description: Cashier responsibilities include receiving payments and issuing receipts, gift-wrapping packages and keeping track of all cash and credit transactions.

positions.title: Lifeguard
positions.description: Must be Red Cross Lifeguard certified or take our lifeguard class. Clean at night when the park closes.

positions.title: Delivery Driver
positions.description: Responsible for delivering food to customers with excellent customer service and a positive attitude. Ability to operate store technology.

positions.title: Evening Team Member
positions.description: You will never have a dull moment when you are on the Team at Swig! You'll wear many hats, but your primary focus is to make sure our customers get nothing less than a fantastic experience.

positions.title: Sales Associate -- Provo Towne Center
positions.description: Engage, educate, and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience.

positions.title: Restaurant Cashier
positions.description: Free meals + meal discounts. Medical, dental, vision and life insurance. Build your customer service skills.

positions.title: Retail Store Associate
positions.description: Providing differentiated customer service by anticipating customer needs, demonstrating compassion and care in all interactions, and actively identifying and resolving potential service issues

positions.title: Library Page
positions.description: Shelve all assigned library items accurately and quickly. Shift items on shelves to maintain even item distribution.

positions.title: Brand Ambassador
positions.description: Consistently creates a welcoming environment as customers enter or exit the store.

positions.title: Summer Guide
positions.description: The Summer Guide creates a memorable, engaging and fun experience for guests by hosting guided mountain bike and hiking excursions.

positions.title: Restaurant Team Member
positions.description: Work together on a team to prepare menu items as guests order. Greet and interact with guests while serving
